lines.text:
[continuously chops a piece of meat that weighs the same due to his leaning on the scale]
I must be losing my touch. This is a heavy pound of beef.

[filling up Buster's molasses bucket, he walks off with it]
Aren't you forgetting something?

[points to the bucket]
It's in there.

[to Alum]
Try not to snort while you're slurping.

[dressed up as girls]
Aren't you worried about splitting your mouth open even wider than it already is?
